attributes.action: Keep the Kings Halls, Cheadle Hulme, as a Wetherspoons!
attributes.additional_details: The Kings Hall is central to Cheadle Hulme, easily accessible by car, train or buses. This, combined with the low prices, appeals to locals and visitors alike. From breakfast to closing, this pub is always busy with a good attendance of all age groups. Whilst this pub is not pretentious, it boasts a great atmosphere for all to enjoy. Simply put, this pub needs to stay as a Wetherspoons!
attributes.background: The Kings Hall, constructed in 1937, is an asset to our community. From its friendly helpful staff to the range of cask ales, lagers & other beverages.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. From the information you've provided, it sounds like this is a commercial decision by Wetherspoons.
